content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case in the municipal court split the case involved the dissolution of coownership of a property consisting of an apartment and land the property was sold at a public auction and the obtained value was distributed the petitioner ig and the proposed party sv were both entitled to half of the amount obtained the decision was based on article 50 of the property act the applicant sv filed a proposal with the court requesting the division of coownership the respondent claimed sole ownership of the property and rejected the proposal evidence was presented including an inheritance resolution land registry records and an expert opinion on the value of the property the court expert assessed the value of the property and determined that it could not be physically divided so a civil partition was the best solution
